about.title: About Me
about.description:
Full Stack Developer & Data Engineer

Building scalable systems that connect code, data, and real-world impact.

I specialize in NestJS (Node.js) and Next.js, developing modular APIs and full-stack applications with a focus on performance, security, and clean architecture.

Skilled in Python ETL pipelines, I design and automate data workflows that transform and integrate complex datasets — supporting analytics, automation, and decision-making.

Experienced with PostgreSQL and MongoDB, and continuously exploring AWS and microservice architectures to build efficient, scalable, and reliable solutions.

Passionate about transforming technical challenges into systems that deliver measurable results.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional journey and key roles.

0.title: Full-stack Developer
0.description: Full Stack Developer at DMX Design, working on projects built with NestJS (Node.js) and React, applying best practices in architecture, security, and performance. Responsible for collaborating with clients throughout all development phases, conducting technical and functional reviews to ensure quality and continuous value delivery. Also experienced in data engineering, focusing on ETL processes in Python, pipeline automation, and the integration of socioeconomic data used in territorial analysis and strategic planning projects, including initiatives related to COP30.
0.skills: ETL (Extract, Transform, Load), Python and more 7 skills

1.title: Application Developer
1.description: I am currently part of the team responsible for the development and maintenance of ECR, a global contract repository widely adopted within the company. In my day-to-day work, I work on developing new features and resolving bugs in a web application built with Angular. In addition, I am involved in the creation and maintenance of microservices using Python and Node.js, ensuring the delivery of high-quality code through constant reviews. Stack and tools: - Frontend: Angular, JavaScript - Backend: Node.js/Express, Python/Flask - Testing: Automation with Selenium, manual testing - Database: MongoDB, SQL - DevOps and Infrastructure: Docker/Podman, Kubernetes, RedHat OpenShift - Version Control: Git, GitHub

2.title: Intern
2.description: I'm currently an intern on the team that develops and maintains ECR, a global contract repository used across the company. I help develop new features and fix bugs in a web application built with Angular. I also assist in creating and maintaining microservices using Python and Node.js, focusing on delivering high-quality code through regular reviews. Stack and tools: - Frontend: Angular, JavaScript - Backend: Node.js, Python/Flask - Testing: Selenium automation, manual testing - Database: MongoDB, SQL - DevOps and Infrastructure: Docker/Podman, Kubernetes, RedHat OpenShift - Version Control: Git, GitHub
